title: the q&a sticker DOES‚ÄôNT work!
text: would be 5 stars if the dang questions sticker worked. it doesn‚Äôt show up on my sticker menu but all of my friends have it. please fix it ASAP. how come my side account has these features and my main doesn‚Äôt? i‚Äôve tried EVERYTHING. deleting the app, logging out, only having my main on the app and nothing has worked. i have a i phone 6s and version 60.0. the update was like version 52 so why isn‚Äôt it working? i only rated 5 stars for you to see that your users of your app are unhappy and yet you do nothing to fix our bugs or problems! i‚Äôve reported this over 10 times and your support team has made 0 effort to fix this issue that has been going on for a month which looks like your app has 0 interest in making sure ALL of your users are happy bc i‚Äôm sure not and MANY other people are having the same issue and yet we‚Äôre being IGNORED. it‚Äôs been over a month and this problem has persisted. take your negative feedback and work on it. your obviously not making an effort to fix this problem so i should make 0 effort supporting your app. now do i have your attention?

title: Shadow Banned ..???
text: I‚Äôve come to terms with being permanently Shadow-Banned, and realize there is no solution to this problem. IG has enacted a new form of Censorship that is not only affecting me, but thousands of other creators, with robotic-like 0 logic going into the thought process. There is no way of rectifying the situation, and nobody to communitarian with, and Instagram just doesn‚Äôt care. So with that, I‚Äôll continue posting my art work from over the years here, of models who have all willfully posed for me, who were all over the age of 18 at the time of the shoot, and signed modeling releases, and were compensated. Regardless, my profile name is not appearing in searches, nor are my hash tags. If you wonder why you‚Äôve seen a drop in views, try looking for your photos in the hash tags you add to your posts and see if you can find them or not. If you can‚Äôt, you have been shadow-banned by a site that protects the identity of those who wrongly accuse you of TOS violations, unlike any Law Enforcement report you submit, you can‚Äôt do those anonymously.. But on IF, any troll can file a false report, claiming anything they want, and immediate action is taken against the individual, with nobody to go to for arbitration. Instagram does not care. Hence why I say this platform should be regulated.

title: How about I decide what I want to see
text: Years ago I switched over to Instagram from fb because my reason for using fb was to see pictures of my friends & family. Fb got way too bogged down with ‚Äústuff‚Äù. Loads of crap I didn‚Äôt want to wade through in order to see what my friends were up to or to see pictures of my nieces that live in another country. So, instagram felt like a more natural clutter free platform. But, you had to follow in fb‚Äôs steps and have the audacity to decide you or some algorithm know what I want to see in my feed. Stop. You don‚Äôt know what I want to see and quit trying to think you do. If I follow a person It‚Äôs because I have some interest in them. When I click on Instagram to have a gander I want my feed to üò± actually include everyone I follow. And, god forbid, I‚Äôd like it in chronological order. For many reasons I want it in chronological order and I‚Äôd hope the powers that at fb/instagram HQ are smart enough to figure it out. Put in all the ads you want, you gotta pay the bills- I get it, but leave my feed alone. Let me see everyone I follow without having to go directly to their page/feed. And, do it in order! I get extremely irritated when I read an announcement about events, sales, or other happenings and it‚Äôs two-three days old and therefore out of date.

title: Bad for business
text:
I‚Äôm a new business and created a page specifically for that reason. While creating a following and following others I start to see posts from the same person, then all the posts from the next person. Huh, so confused. My other page shows things from different people as they post them. Why do I have to scroll alllllllll the way to the bottom to see if anyone else actually posted anything new, say..... in the last few days??  So I delete the first person at the top of my feed to see what‚Äôs happens. All the next persons posts are there from the last year, right at the top! What, but why in the H...... so I delete that next one, and posts from everyone I‚Äôm following is now allllll gone. It‚Äôs like I‚Äôm following zero people. It‚Äôs like if I don‚Äôt follow those two people whose posts were dominating the top of my feed, then I have nothing to see. And when I add those two back on, the same thing happens! Those same two people posts are dominating the top of my feed! Very frustrating! But IG is so freaking amazing, Right?
Maybe i should call over to Facebook for assistance, since they now own IG.

title: Instagram
text: The app is cool and all nothing bad to say about the app itself. However it‚Äôs more of the people and other accounts that are on it i been on instagram for a couple of years then deleted my old account cuz i need a break form social media all together i reinstalled it maybe 2 weeks ago made a new account for a fresh start of course i got followed by fake accounts and scammers either trying to use me or ask me for money so i since i had so many of them i decided to unfollow them so that why i could enjoy the app without being bother by all that however i been having issues with my account won‚Äôt load anything I can‚Äôt load or chat with anything on it and don‚Äôt know why I would like to use the app for my friends and family but not if I have to make a new account so yea overall the app is interesting and a cool and good way to keep in touch with loved ones and met new people im just having a error or loading issues that I want to figure out so i know why it‚Äôs acting the way it is so if I lost me account or if it‚Äôs just a app problem

title: My account was stolenüò°
text:
I was scammed and the scammers have taken control of my account!!! I can not log back into it and all 1500+ posts are just gone!! From all the way back to 2013! Luckily I had a second account for work and I was following my stolen account! I had to go back and find MY stolen account and screenshot all 1500+ photos, open a new account, set it to private and try and reload all my posts!!! Now it‚Äôs starting to restrict my posts saying they don‚Äôt meet guidelines‚Ä¶they did before!! 
Anyway, I tried to use the help/support link and an ‚ÄúInstagram Supporter‚Äù emailed me back and went through what seemed like a normal retrieval process until they said they needed a video for identification verification‚Ä¶sounds normal, right? Then they said I had to send the video saying I invested $1000 and won $10,000 in 3 hrs!! 
Now the scammers are using MY stolen account to post stories about their scam! Like I said with my work account following my stolen account I can see all the lies they are spreading using my kids pictures to promote it!!! It sickens me that there is NO ONE I can actually talk to about this!!! And now I can‚Äôt even set up my new account because my pictures, that I took screenshots of, from MY stolen account, do not meet guidelines!! 
I am beyond furious!

title: Confused
text: I‚Äôve always loved Instagram! I think people love being able to interact with friends, post creative photography or videos etc., and also for business, doing collaborations and making money from using Instagram. However, I think some of the newer updates seem to just be rubbing people the wrong way. I‚Äôve a supporter of Instagram but I think they need to listen to the feedback, people love Instagram for being the social media site where they can post photos and have DM‚Äôs. I know they got reels to be more like their competitors, TikTok but who says their isn‚Äôt room for both? Instagram sticks out by being themselves not a TikTok 2.0 I‚Äôd say still allow great engagement for both photos and videos. I personally don‚Äôt have the reel feature on my account, I‚Äôve been trying to figure out how to get the REEL feature but I‚Äôve still been unable to find it, not sure if only some accounts got it. Still uncertain how I feel about random pages I don‚Äôt follow being on my newsfeed (that‚Äôs what Explore is for) but honestly I like Instagram and I hope they keep being themselves, that‚Äôs why they got so huge in the first place.

title: Censoring the truth about what Palestinians face on a day to day basis
text: Palestinians are going through the worst right now. This is all because of the Israeli government. Just continuously stripping Palestinians of their human rights. In addition to, the annexation of Palestinian land such as sheikh jarrah in east Jerusalem which is recognized by the UN as Palestinian land under resolution 478 signed in 1980 where 14 council members signed with it and the Reagan administration did not VETO this. Yet they‚Äôre still facing forceful explosions from their homes and the IDF support this and defend the Israeli settlers doing so. In addition to lynch mobs in Israel attacking Palestinians in streets and taking them out of cars to attack them and storming inside their homes with guns, clubs and knives. Yet Instagram sit here and censor this information so the world doesn‚Äôt know what‚Äôs really happening there. Because it doesn‚Äôt satisfy their capitalist agenda. Do better Instagram and let people have a freedom of speech and to spread the truth of Israel‚Äôs war crimes and murder of innocent children. Disgusting.

title: Bug fixes needed badly
text:
Hey Instagram! I am struggling on this app because whenever I try to post either on my story or my account it says, "we'll try again when there's a better connection." And I've restarted my connection logged out logged in and all I get is the same old same old. I get that Instagram just builds a bigger variety a day and it's hard to just register that there is just to much glitching. I get that there is A LOT going on in this app at once, the population is huge I get it. But I can't do ANYTHING without it say "we'll try again when you have a better connection¬∑" and yet, my connection is just fine! I don't understand why or why when I post something it also deletes itself. I seem to post a lot on my account which maybe is the reason but, I'm not as active all the time so idk why it says all this. I close out the app go in again and... Bam; NOTHING!!! Yayyyy!! No. It's really difficult as well but also very annoying.

Don't get me wrong Instagram ROCKS I love it it's everything I want, it's just, it's kinda annoying and I want to post! So please read in on this and consider it.
-scar

title: Disappointing updates to the format
text: I enjoyed Instagram when my feed consisted of posts I was actually interested in. It was a nice app to simply spend time on, especially when my Discover page was similar to the posts I interacted with in my feed. However, the Reels and Shop features have been amplified, while the content within my own feed and the Discovery page seem to stray away from my interests. Many accounts that I follow have to take extra steps in order to show up in their followers' feed. This has made harder for small businesses, non-profits, and activists to spread important information about their cause or product. Simultaneously, their followers have to engage with their posts in a more intense manner. There isn't much reason to save and share a post on your story when you already liked and commented on said post. I understand it may be a way to accurately mold one's feed into the posts they seem to engage with more, but it seems is counterproductive when features such as Reels and Shop are constantly promoted and clutter one's Discovery page. I quite dislike how those elements are placed in the feature bar, while the posting option is located on the very top. I'm hoping instagram can prioritize what their audience wants, over corporate speculation on what we want.

title: It shouldn‚Äôt be harder to post a photo than shop
text: With all the updates that have been made in the last few years including (but not limited to) the shopping section now being on the toolbar, the reels, stories/Snapchat-esque messaging, only showing the most recent posts, and having them out of chronological order/put through it algorithm it makes me question what the purpose of the app even is anymore? Is it supposed to be Etsy? Snapchat? Facebook messenger lite? Tik tok? Having an app that works and has since 2013 is a perfectly fine thing. I don‚Äôt understand the need for constant updates, especially one that moves activity that is relevant to who you follow and your account out of the areas that are easy to see and access. When I go onto Instagram I want to see posts about people snd things I care about not the newest ad for something that I couldn‚Äôt afford if I became an Instagram influencer. The original purpose of the app was supposed to be to share photos of things that are important to you. Why would you deviate so much from something that has made the app so appealing and kept it relevant for so many years. If I wanted to have Etsy, tik tok, Snapchat, and Facebook features I would go to those apps. I know cornering the market in business is important but it‚Äôs redundant and seems desperate to make Instagram something it‚Äôs not.

title: My problems with this app
text:
1. Sometimes, when I try to send a photo, the other person receives the photo, but from my perspective it disappears from the chat after 2 seconds from sending it.
2. This happened to me 2 times. I received a photo from someone after a day... 
3. It happened maybe too many times to accidentally video call people. I would like to hide that from the chat. It‚Äôs too easy to video call people and embarrass yourself. Is it that hard to put it somewhere else? Maybe deactivate it from the settings? I‚Äôm sure there‚Äôs no setting for that yet and many people would like to have that.
4. Maybe this isn‚Äôt that big of a problem, but it happens quite often. I‚Äôm just trying to open Instagram and it just crashes a second after...
5. I don‚Äôt get notifications anymore. I‚Äôm not sure when it started, maybe after the last update, but I tried a lot of things to activate my notifications back and I still couldn‚Äôt find the solution. In the settings (both instagram and my phone) it says that they‚Äôre active... I also tried to delete the app and installed it again and nothing changed... All I can do is change the app. Good job, Instagram! üëèüëè

title: Instagram; Not What It Used To Be
text: When I first joined Instagram (about 6 years ago), it was a social media site for and about photography. I enjoyed being a part of a photo centric community, who were interested in posting, viewing, commenting and following other members with similar interest. Sadly it has morphed into an entertainment site, of reels and ads. Seems like photography is now a second thought. Additionally, it used to be that you could select those other members that you shared interests or liked their work. Now I seem to get so many Followers ‚Äúassigned‚Äùto me by an algorithm simply because I may click into one of their photos. I hate that. I don‚Äôt need to have followers assigned to my photo gallery. It wastes my time. So I compensate by cutting back on my Instagram time.  Additionally, I‚Äôm not sure that my real followers are actually seeing my posts. I seem to get far fewer likes now than I used to. Bottom line, Instagram is not as much fun or of interest to me as it once was. I think you need to get back to your roots of being a photography site, for photographers.

title: I have never deleted an app more frequently!
text:
Ahhh instagram, the app i have to delete every few months when an ‚Äúupdate‚Äù renders it unusable ‚Ä¶ sigh‚Ä¶ most recently deleted since it keeps flagging and removing my comments telling me they‚Äôre spam! Previous update & deletion: all of my animal advocacy accounts are now subjected to ‚Äúsuggested reels‚Äù of animals being harassed and abused with no option to block/ hide/ etc‚Ä¶ so i delete‚Ä¶how can they get their ads SO RIGHT yet fail so miserably on their feeds? Previous- IG Blocks for Helping People/Animals too Quickly?! 2nd ban in a week?! IG has once again become unusable. It does not tell me why i am suddenly unable to comment on anything other than ‚Äúto protect the community ‚Äú which ironically is precisely what i use IG to do lol deleting again‚Ä¶ at this rate i‚Äôll have to learn to use tictok and network shelter dogs there‚Ä¶ 1 week back: Experiencing my first ‚Äúshadow ban‚Äù after 9 yrs on IG! Lol apparently if you network too many death row dogs, comment too often to help people save them, and direct disabled people to resources that helped you, YOU WILL BE BLOCKED ‚Äúto protect the community‚Äù LOL what a great ‚Äúcommunity‚Äù‚Ä¶ who would have thought‚Ä¶

title: 4.derecksito
text: The reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because im so tired of asking for the updates like its everytime theres an update mine won't update like others it takes months to do so and it's becoming so annoying, you know when someone mentions you in a history and you click the button to re post it, so o for some people you just click the video and it becomes full and says you like posted it from someone who mentioned you, well for me I have to zoom it in my self and if there's any emojis or anything on the top then they don't show since I zoom in to the middle, the music on the notes I got it but I only got it because I kept asking for it since I wouldn't get it, now it's the boomerang or tv on the notes, or just the liking or responding notes with pics or wtv I don't have any of that, my point is I'm not getting the updates, I get them so late and it's becoming annoying cause I have other accounts and they work just fine with the updates but for me it's not like that it takes months to do so then when a new update comes out I have to wait way more it doesn't even tell me to update Instagram or anything so please fix that my user is 4.derecksito

title: Instagram Tampers With Followers And I Have Proof
text: I‚Äôve started taking screenshots of my page, analytics, and the new followers my account receives under notifications to show that Instagram doesn‚Äôt add them to my business account‚Äôs total followers. Analytics shows unchanged numbers for new followers and no new unfollows, so they‚Äôve kept my account at a certain number. The incredibly dishonest and shady thing is the ‚Äúnew followers‚Äù I steadily see in my notifications (that never get added to analytics or my follower count on my page) come from boosted posts that I pay for. So I‚Äôm giving money to Instagram while they have determined to keep my account at a predetermined number it seems. There‚Äôs no other explanation. This has gone on for months. Of course there‚Äôs zero accountability on their end as they have removed all avenues to contact someone. We have sent countless reports including screenshots proving this and have yet to actually get some sort of a response. We realize we never will. Our account status is fine with zero violations. Instagram is dishonest and will continue taking your money for boosted posts while tampering with your followers and reach. Unfortunately we aren‚Äôt the only account this has happened to as a simple Google search will show you. Apparently Instagram really is trash.

title: Dear Instagram: Why are you bullying small creators?
text:
A. You don‚Äôt show 87% of my own followers my posts and I know I‚Äôm not the only one with this problem. Why wouldn‚Äôt you? They are literally following me so they can see my posts there is no reason not to show it!!
B. You don‚Äôt promote small artists! I used to think I didn‚Äôt see smaller artist‚Äôs posts a couple months ago but it‚Äôs really impressive how you made it worse. I see maybe two small artist‚Äôs posts a week and I literally haven‚Äôt seen anything with less than 10,000 likes in a solid month at least. 
C. You keep changing the algorithm and it feels like every update is new bad news for small creators. Bring back recent tags and stop making it so reels are literally the only way to get more than 100 views! 
D. Yes I‚Äôm doing this as part of a boycott. But the fact that I‚Äôve seen about 5 times more posts complaining about Instagram bullying small creators than I‚Äôve seen small creators posts speaks for itself. You are creating your own demons Instagram.
Don‚Äôt get me wrong, it‚Äôs a fine social media platform otherwise and really one of the only ones small artist have left, so it‚Äôs so frustrating to see everyone struggling when I can‚Äôt come up with a single reason why you‚Äôd do any of this stuff that‚Äôs beating up small artists!

title: Following Activity
text: Made the app much less exciting and I feel way more disconnected from people after this update. Gives the app a very lonely and more artificial feel, and the following activity, to me, was a superior way of finding new and exciting posts than the discover feature. The following tab in conjunction with the discover was the way to go, leaving the following activity behind in favor of discover disempowers the users‚Äô ability to find new and interesting accounts that lack the influential level of larger accounts which appear in the discover, which also makes it harder for those accounts to grow. Ultimately, I don‚Äôt feel as though removing this feature was a productive change, and it definitely made the app less interesting. Twitter has a similar function to the following activity, as occasionally posts people you follow like pop up on your timeline, and if you have tweetdeck you essentially have an even better following activity tab which makes the app more intriguing. I don‚Äôt see why Instagram should lack this. Please bring it back. Thank you.

title: I loved IG BEFORE FB took over but now‚Ä¶
text: It is starting to be just like FB. I removed myself from FB because it started to do too much and demand too much from users like deep personal information and forcing you to do things by preventing use. I was just forced to add my birthday on my page before I can access it on IG! That doesn‚Äôt keep under age ppl off! You see inappropriate stuff then remove it at that time. FB has access to it all. Don‚Äôt force me to pour my deep personal information into this app just to be able to post pictures and network. Everyday the app changes and add something unnecessary and don‚Äôt let you start getting likes or speaking your mind on deep topics, it will shadow your page, delete it or when ppl search for it, it will not pull up unless you go find where the person was tagged or maybe you shared one of their videos. It‚Äôs crazy! Leave the app alone. Some changes are good but the owners of FB don‚Äôt know when to stop! They just keep changing crap. One time I had a business account and then it said I HAD to open a FB account to keep it and share content. Nope, not with it! I don‚Äôt see myself staying on here in the future. Trying to hold on. Leave it be!

title: Algorithm
text: I understand that it is difficult to build an algorithm around a person‚Äôs preferences, but the system should be able to detect that I don‚Äôt like a certain type of post after I‚Äôve said ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not interested‚Äù multiple times. I don‚Äôt use instagram to have useless propaganda and everyone else‚Äôs political ideals shoved into my face on my explore page. I want my explore page to actually be posts that I want to see, but it seems that instagram can‚Äôt make a basic system to stop showing posts I express a lack of interest in a number of times. This wouldn‚Äôt be as big of an issue if the number of posts like the ones I expressed disinterest in didn‚Äôt increase. It seems like the more I actively expressed disinterest, the more the algorithm showed me those posts until my explore page was flooded with things I couldn‚Äôt care less about. I find the app to be poorly run, and the company obviously does not listen to the users opinions on the interface. But hey, what can you expect from Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg. They aren‚Äôt exactly known for caring about their users. They only do it for the money, yet people still continue to put up with it without speaking out about their unhappiness with certain updates and features.

title: No way to report stolen content
text:
Instagram is full of re-share accounts that will steal your content without your permission and/or without giving you credit. Hashtags are completely dominated by these re-share accounts, which many times pretend they are the original creators. I‚Äôve been followed by fake accounts that have stolen my images, as well as images belonging to my friends. According to instagram it‚Äôs totally fine if someone steals your photo and uses it as their profile image, & more. They may say that they‚Äôre against copyright infringement and say they want people to post their own original content, but when it comes down to it, they will do absolutely nothing about these pathetic thieves. There‚Äôs no way to report someone for stealing your images as far as I can tell. üëéüèª Their reporting options are extremely limited and don‚Äôt include a selection for stolen pictures or videos.

Now when posting stories and choosing music from Instagram‚Äôs own selection, they may block & remove the videos, because it‚Äôs a copyright violation! Does that make any sense??? I‚Äôm using music from your own library, which I‚Äôm assuming Instagram obtained some rights for their users to use. How am I the one violating anyone‚Äôs copyrights??? I‚Äôm using your app to add to my story from YOUR selection of songs! ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: TERRIBLE INFRASTRUCTURE!!
text: I normally don‚Äôt write reviews but I had to share my experience from Instagram. Not only did the app crash several times while trying to upload multiple photos on my business account, everytime I tried to open the app it kept crashing. I tried redownloading the application and logging in,  and again it crashes when trying to upload a photo. Not only is this ridiculous but this wasted at least 2+ hours of troubleshooting and fixing whatever issues I thought I had on my phone (which does not have any issues & every other application is working properly.) I know I have an older iPhone, (iPhone 7 128 GB) but you have got to be kidding me if this is the reason why I can‚Äôt upload regular photos/content anymore. I‚Äôm convinced Apple is deliberately doing this for users who have older versions of their phones and the tech employees who create and maintain the app are purposely leaving those with older phones in the dust. NOPE! I‚Äôm through with it! Not only am I disappointed, but I‚Äôm embarrassed and ashamed to even own an Apple product at this point. As a small business owner I want to rely on uploading regular content & the paid promotions content to gain clientele and now I cannot due either to the interruption of service on my device. Stay away as far as you can.

title: Please read this
text: Instagram needs to be banned, or have major changes. It can be fun, you can chat with friends, and look at cool and exciting pictures or videos. But there is lots of bad people on that app also, I‚Äôve seen so many racist comments and accounts that are SUPER offensive. I‚Äôve also seen lots of inappropriate accounts and pictures, like pictures of private parts, (I scrolled upon them by accident). Instagram has good people on it, but there is much more bad people on IG than you think. Lots of children go on this app just to have fun, post pictures, and talk with friends, but they can end up scrolling on something wrong that can mess them up really bad. And every time I tried to report these bad accounts, the message back says, ‚ÄúWe have reviewed this account and we don‚Äôt see a problem with this‚Äù or something like that, Out of tons of reports of bad accounts, only 1 of them has been banned. The people that work there really need to take their time to look at these accounts to see what‚Äôs wrong with them, why would we just ban some account just because. I hope you guys and gals see this and either really change the app, or delete it of the App Store. We can‚Äôt have all of this bad stuff on this app that doesn‚Äôt even get looked at by the people that work there.

title: Likes and Dislikes
text: When I was just using Instagram as a personal way to catch up with my friends and see silly videos Instagram was a solid 4. The algorithm was annoying and I hate how I can‚Äôt preference how I want to see my page but whatever. I could still deal. But I made a new page recently that is more of a blog that I‚Äôm trying to get followers on and Instagram is making that IMPOSSIBLE for someone to do their ‚Äúright‚Äù way. I I don‚Äôt know what Instagram needs to do to fix this but I hope they know I will continuously report problems any time they soft block me because it‚Äôs not fair or right and if I ever lose my page when I haven‚Äôt done a single thing wrong I‚Äôd just be done with the whole app.

title: Stuck in older version and can‚Äôt use original audios anymore
text:
From about two weeks ago, my app turned to the older version. I have two accounts, one is my personal account and one is my food blog account. It happened first to the food account and I thought it‚Äôs because I did something wrong with that account. And then my personal account‚Äôs page also turned into the older version. And it got worse, now for some reels I‚Äôm watching, I can hear the audio anymore as well. Just the video, no sound. But this only happens to some reels, not all of them. 

I rely on reels to promote my content, and now I‚Äôm stuck with it. I tried everything you can think of. Turn and app off and on again, log out and back to my account, delete and re-install the app, update the app, switch account type. EVERYTHING!! And the support team never replied to my reports. I‚Äôm very frustrated and just hope someone can help. 

Based on the previous reviews, I‚Äôm not the only one who has this problem, so I would appreciate so much if anyone can share how to fix this problem.

title: Instagram stories feature not working correctly?
text: Well, I tried requesting instagram support for an issue multiple times but we all know thats a lost cause so here i am writing this review. The instagram story feature where you can add additional photos/videos to your story isn't working correctly for my 3 accounts for some reason and it‚Äôs been like this for years. its been bugging me so much that I'm desperate to find a solution. When I tap on it, i can only see photos on my camera roll and not any of my videos and its really inconvenient. I assumed it was a bug from a new update from a while back and that it would fix itself but now i just feel hopeless. It‚Äôs not the end of the world that a simple feature doesn‚Äôt work but i just cant help but feel like a failure. Does the universe want me to suffer with little inconveniences until it slowly consumes me? I‚Äôm not sure but instagram is making me feel that way. On my boyfriend‚Äôs account it works just fine so maybe the instagram gods just don‚Äôt want me to be happy. I‚Äôve tried everything... logging in and out, uninstalling and reinstalling the app, turning my phone on and off, checking to see updates of the app, and just simply waiting 3 years. No luck. I need help and maybe some therapy for the trauma I‚Äôve experienced with this app. I love and hate this app with my entire soul.

title: love instagram, but...
text: i love instagram! one of my favorite apps! just one issue, i would love for there to be an option to remove just one of the photos posted in the multiple photos option. i really like being able to post more than one photo, but sometimes i look back on one of the pictures and change my mind about it and wish to delete just that single one, not the whole post. another great idea would be to allow us not only to delete one specific photo but also be able to move/rearrange the pictures we posted without having to repost the entire thing. these options could be incorporated with the ‚Äúedit‚Äù button & with each ‚Äúslide‚Äù of pictures posted there could be a delete button which would only delete THAT picture, not the others. as for the rearrange choice, there could be an option with all the other choices like delete, archive, turn off commenting, etc. I know i‚Äôm not the only user with this desire so these slight changes would make a huge difference to users and make instagram an even more enjoyable app!! please consider!!! thanks!

title: Chronological Order/Explore Page
text:
Please, I believe most IG users would appreciate if our timeline feed were in chronological order. It just makes keeping up with who we follow much easier.

I also noticed that the explore page has changed. This is a little bit more complicated to explain but I‚Äòll try my best. When I first tap on the icon, I see the overview of what‚Äòs on the page: various videos, pictures, memes, etc.. However when I go further and tap on one of the pictures I saw to see more details and start to scroll down, I see completely different posts than I saw on the overview. I‚Äòm not sure if this is supposed to help broaden the scope of which posts I get exposed to, or what the point is, it throws me off quite a bit. I expect to see one thing and then see another. Maybe a solution would be to provide an option where each individual user can choose one of the other?  That would be nice.

Other than, I thoroughly enjoy the updates, especially the option to share posts separately with others. I think the design is nice and have high hopes for it. Thank you!

title: Serious info update lag
text: There is a serious lag with the comment and like updates as well as people following and unfollowing. I haven‚Äôt had anyone unfollow me in a long time, I don‚Äôt post a lot and the people who are following me are all people I‚Äôve known or had on here for years... recently I‚Äôve been posting a lot more and I get notifications on my phone 10 times a day that I have a new follower but the number only changes by like 2 or it goes down. Same with likes or comments on posts, I go to look and there‚Äôs nothing there or no change to what was.. Also when posting a video it shows number of ‚Äòviews‚Äô but one ‚Äòlike‚Äô, when you click on it it shows the list of users who liked it.. what‚Äôs the purpose of not having the 2 totals actually side by side? I don‚Äôt care about followers or likes but when my phone is buzzing all the time with notifications and I get on here to look and it‚Äôs not registering it‚Äôs pretty annoying. Increasingly so that I want to stop using the app. I‚Äôm in school to be a talent manager and social media is a large platform for building connections. So I think you should do some bug fixes, maybe the lag is from the ridiculous influx of unnecessary ads you allow. #sellouts just sayin

title: Bad experience for photographer

title: I used to love instagram
text: I‚Äôve been using instagram since it came out and i have never had any issues with the app. I had never had any post or stories taken down, not been banned or anything, i always respect the guidelines because i have a small business in which I relay on my exposure on my social medias and instagram was my biggest platform and i had many followers. Also i like to mention i have never had any other accounts under my name or my information created. Well a few days ago I received an email saying my account was disabled because there was another account with my information something of that sort, I quickly email them not once but twice presenting them my case in which I believe me losing my account was not right specially after building my business through my social media and I have yet to receive any response,its been more than a week. Also after the email my family and friends were trying to find my page and it would show up but now it doesn‚Äôt any longer. I am extremely upset!!!!!

title: An issue I have with the search feature
text:
Instagram is an app I use a lot, and I‚Äôm very happy with it in general. There is one thing I have an irritation with however and that‚Äôs the search feature. It‚Äôs not a bug or anything, it‚Äôs just something I feel could use some looking-into. That is being able to search for multiple topics at once.
For example: Let‚Äôs say I found a super cute post of a Toucan dressed as a cowboy. I leave it a like and continue on liking the other posts I see. About a week passes and I‚Äôm reminded of the post and would like to show it to a friend. It‚Äôs too far in the past to find, and I can‚Äôt remember who posted it. I could use the search feature, but I can only look up one hashtag at a time. So I could try searching through over 150K #toucan posts. Or over 4.5M #cowboy posts. My best hope is that the person miraculously included #cowboytoucan in the post as well.
Basically, I just want to be able to search for multiple hashtags in the same search so I can narrow down my options. 
Thank you for reading this, I hope you can at least consider my suggestion.

title: Algorithms are killing me
text:
Hello, I am writing because something needs to happen to the suggested algorithms. I am looking to adopt a cat, and I adore cats my whole life. But ig figured that out and litterally within two days all the reels are see are now about cats. Litterally 90% are about cats. Why does instagram assume that I want to see cats all day? All the content is so narrowed down as nothing else happens in the world but cats. I am a students, I am interested in finances and I want to expand my view and look at new things, learn new things. Now my entire feed is only cats. I almost don‚Äôt want to adopt one now because for the last two days I have seen so many of cat content, i can‚Äôt believe that I am saying it but i just tired of cats now. Can you imagine? 

So I deleted the app, as there is no way to turn off suggestions. I wish I could see unbiased, simply what I am following. Why does instagram decide what I want to see?  

Instagram and Facebook, you need to stop narrowing down the interests. Using these apps absolutely degregates ppl, if I see cats only just by liking a few cat posts, imagine what ppl see that liked a couple gun violence posts.  Please start suggesting new varying things to app users. My brain melts from your suggestions, the apps make it seems as there is nothing else in the world going on.

title: My account has been locked for over a week I wouldn‚Äôt have given 1 star.
text: My account was locked stating I may be too young to use Instagram. I‚Äôve sent several different pictures of my ID as I finally received a message saying my picture was too small, dark, or blurry but they didn‚Äôt specify which. So I sent another picture as they requested because once they see I‚Äôm over 13, they will unlock my account. I asked if that picture was better. I have not received a response. I also emailed the same photo that‚Äôs clear to me to a friend & they could see it just fine. My account is still locked so I tried to appeal with a different photo. I get a box stating I can‚Äôt use that feature because Instagram is trying to limit spam. I waited 24 hours, tried to appeal again, I got the same response. I waited 48 hours, got the same response. I wrote this a few days ago & guess what?! My account is still locked & instead of someone doing their job & reading the emails I‚Äôm wasting my time sending, I keep getting an automated response & a link to send a proper ID which I‚Äôve sent from the beginning. If I could give negative stars, we‚Äôre there now. Also it has a link to download your content on my account, but it doesn‚Äôt work‚Ä¶ just like their process for resolving issues.

title: Great app with frustrating issues
text: Instagram is a great app for posting content, however it can make posting frustrating when dealing with the issues that come with it. First of all, when posting any sort of video or photo with good quality, that quality always gets reduced and ruined when posted. No matter what there is to be done about it, once it‚Äôs posted the post destroys the quality. Second of all, and this is a pretty recent thing, when watching video posts the audio of the video gets cut out at different parts of the video. I thought that it was just me, but I had my friend test it out as well. I also thought it was a headphone issue, but even without anything you can hear the audio being cut out at different points in the video on all video posts. Refresh those videos, and the cuts happen at completely different times as though they are random. This makes posting very frustrating because people aren‚Äôt able to view the photos/videos as good as they were before they were even posted. PLEASE try to fix this, I‚Äôve tried contacting Instagram about it multiple times, but I‚Äôve never gotten any sort of answer in return.

title: HELP!
text: Instagram, PLEASE fix the issue with banning random accounts for slightly suspicious activity. My art account (keiras_art_stuff) was the only thing that motivated me to draw and I was so grateful for that, but Instagram keeps blocking me from actions (I can‚Äôt like, comment, follow, send a link, tag someone, or post with a caption). Ive gotten this ban thing at least 4 times, but usually they only lasted 2-3 days; however, my recent ban has lasted over a month with no sign of stopping. This is extremely frustrating when I had planned to post weekly and I‚Äôm losing followers and profile interaction because of it. Worst of all, I can‚Äôt show any support for other creators by liking or commenting, which makes me feel terrible. I‚Äôve reported the problem over 15 times in the app, reached out to Instagram directly, and written multiple reviews such as this so that MAYBE, HOPEFULLY someone will see it and help... Again, ive done nothing to warrant this ban, yet Instagram has ignored me and nothing in the help center or online has told me how to fix it besides the ‚Äúdon‚Äôt use your account for a few days‚Äù which doesn‚Äôt work (I didn‚Äôt use Instagram for over a week and the ban still persisted). Please, PLEASE fix this or help me... I‚Äôm so worried that I‚Äôll never have my account back and it meant so much to me since it was my only creative outlet. Please see this.. ugh

title: Shopping?
text: I‚Äôm sorry. What??? Shopping?? If I want to shop I‚Äôm not about to do it on Instagram. Please move the notifications section or whatever it‚Äôs called back to where it used to be. Where is should be. I don‚Äôt like notifications, I like to click on them to make them go away and that is easiest to do when the notification thing is down below. Now there‚Äôs this stupid shopping thing. I will never shop on Instagram, I have looked at ads, I have clicked on links, yet I have never bought anything on Instagram. I get what you‚Äôre doing, trying to make it safe for people to buy on Insta, prompt real shops and make sure people are not getting scammed (well, part of what you‚Äôre doing). If you want to make revenue that badly, the least you could do is try to not inconvenience your already loyal downloaders. Just. Ugh. If you just have to have this stupid shopping thing, can you at least switch it with the notification button? Have the shopping button be on the top right hand corner, and the notifications be on the bottom again. And while you‚Äôre at it, why don‚Äôt you move the DM button down below too, make everything super accessible.

title: IG
text: Back in our forefathers days, they had no cameras to capture photos of their meals nor did they have a social media platform in which they could upload the pictures with super mega awesome filters for all their friends to see. It took them great lengths of time to carve rudimentary pictures along with hieroglyphic descriptions into hard stone just so later generations could observe what the ancient civilizations had for lunch. Thanks to the reptilian overlord race and their alien technology, today‚Äôs generation doesn‚Äôt have to worry about having to carve pictures into granite, nor whittle away at marble to write out lengthy descriptions of food. IG allows everyone the ability to snap photos of themselves, their cats, and their dinner using beautiful filters to enhance the quality of food items and/or roll back the hands of time to hide the wrinkles! So thankful for FB which allows us to argue with everyone all over the world, IG which allows us to rub our meals into everyone‚Äôs face, and TikTok which allows us to see just how twisted society is and the lengths someone will go for online clout!

title: Listen to the people more‚Ä¶
text:
I never write reviews for anything, so let‚Äôs start there. I came here to write a scathing one but I see many users have beat me to it, so why haven‚Äôt their issues been addressed?

The navigation of the app is odd to me and the app overall can be very glitchy. Examples‚Ä¶ now the developers know that more than likely, people use the app while they‚Äôre still in bed or about to go to bed. Naturally, swiping in the appropriate ways to use the app is UNLIKELY.  Do you know how annoying it is to get into replies that are deep in a comment section and you try to continue swiping down but it swipes right and now you‚Äôre back to the post? Another example: sometimes I can‚Äôt use create until I get out of that and go to camera mode, TAKE A PICTURE (this is a must, just coming out of create and going right back to it does nothing), and then I can use the create and sometimes I have to do this twice before it works. Why? Sound on/off not being consistent; if my volume is off for content on my news feed, why is it on sometimes when I then access stories? It‚Äôs just a hot mess atp with unnecessary changes when old bugs/issues haven‚Äôt been fixed.

title: Instagram does not care about their users
text:
Instagram‚Äôs latest update proves that the app is simply a cash grabbing scheme, disregarding the apps previous usability, in favor of a simple get-rich-quick scam. 

The vast majority of users do not use Instagram as a shopping resource. It is primarily a social media website with shopping and reels as secondary resources. If people wanted an app to shop they would use either Etsy or Tik Tok, respectively. Removing the post and feed buttons from the main task bar, in favor of shopping and reels, proves that Instagram does not care about its users. They only want to make money.

The update has absolutely no benefit for Instagram‚Äôs core audience, yet they do not seem to care. Instagram‚Äôs developers know that despite the anger some may hold regarding the update, they will still use Instagram. I urge you to delete Instagram until they revert the app to its prior format. Instagram needs to learn that its consumers bring in ad revenue and other means of income. Without us they will not make any money and until they cater to our wants, that‚Äôs exactly how it should be.

title: Locked Me Out of My Account
text: Instagram gets 3 stars because I‚Äôm very disappointed in the way it‚Äôs being run and eventually heading in the future. First, I woke up one morning to my account frozen because of ‚Äòsecurity problems‚Äô it had me put in my #, so I did, but the text never came, neither did email. So I try to contact this billion dollar, mega social media ‚Äòenterprise‚Äô for help and they don‚Äôt even have a support line??! Very unprofessional and appalling honestly. Now to their future: the app is no longer fun or interesting or even about its users, in fact, the algorithm now restricts your friends and family with lower follower counts and instead heavily boosts influencers, E commerce and propaganda. They took the ‚Äòaccount notification‚Äô tab and made it harder to find while replacing it with online shopping (also Instagram, the stores you promote are not good quality and half on them steal from us!)And finally, the purpose of Instagram is to share my pictures with an audience, you have restricted that and are now stealing all your ideas from other apps aka: stories from Snapchat and reels from ticktock. Trash company ever since zuckerberg got his filthy hands on it. Truly disappointing.

title: I‚Äôve had Instagram for awhile
text: I‚Äôve been using Instagram for a very long time and I‚Äôve always loved the app, but ever since that new update, my accounts have been acting up. I have five different accounts that I am logged into and today I was logged out of my main account and it‚Äôs not letting me log back in. I try to log back in but it‚Äôs telling me the maximum number of accounts has been reached and when I try to log out of one account it‚Äôs still there thus not allowing me to log into my main account. Some of my friends even complain about how they keep getting logged out. Also one of my accounts isn‚Äôt updated, my main account has always been updating, but the latest update my other accounts don‚Äôt have. If there is an update it should apply for all accounts not just one or two. I love the app, but some small things need to be changed. I rated this five stars so you guys can actually take the time to see this because it isn‚Äôt fair I and many others need to deal with this all the time.

title: SOMEONE HACKED MY ACCOUNT
text: I loved instagram so much. I used it to of course post my pictures but also to inspire people about life and their walk with God! I was more of an encourager to people whom may feel down. I‚Äôve had Instagram for many years since I was in hs! And it breaks my heart at how easy it is for people to hack onto accounts and take them over! All memories gone, all the archive post gone! All the drafts of stuff you made are gone! It‚Äôs not okay! Instagram I need your help with figuring what‚Äôs wrong with my account? If I can‚Äôt get into it should be deleted! Maybe you don‚Äôt care but I‚Äôve been a loyal app user! I always encourage people to get instagram but now I‚Äôm not because what‚Äôs the point of gaining followers and making so much posts and sharing wonderful memories for it to all get taken away one day! And I never clicked on a link or gave anyone my password‚Ä¶so what the heck is this new tech going on it‚Äôs crazy. Please make better protection over people‚Äôs instagram accounts! It‚Äôs not fair for the ppl who‚Äôve worked hard on them.

title: are you actually kidding me right now
text: genuine question is instagram out of its mind ?!? i just tried to post a singing cover and it told me ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt use an original audio on a private account‚Äù ITS MY AUDIO. i‚Äôm not going to make my whole account public just to use MY AUDIO. facebook totally ruined instagram. they‚Äôve silenced tons of activism accounts because they use bots and keywords to report comments, and i‚Äôve gotten threatened to get my account shut down multiple times simply for saying words they find problematic. i can‚Äôt even quote people who are saying bad things because facebook has decided that we can‚Äôt take any form of criticism, or even talk about things we‚Äôre passionate about. it‚Äôs revolting how everybody has been silenced meanwhile i still see racist, homophobic, and sexist posts and even whole accounts soley made for that purpose stay online. so why is it that when i tell someone a post that is actively harassing others ‚Äútrashy‚Äù i am the bully? even when i compliment people if the wording isn‚Äôt just right, instagram says ‚Äúthis comment seems problematicüò§‚Äù they have completely and utterly destroyed my favorite social media and i am NOT impressed whatsoever. it was a photography app and now it‚Äôs every social media wrapped in one yet still seems to screw up every part of it.

title: Gets worse with every update
text:
Please stop with the threads badge!! It was so nice when it disappeared for a bit. Now it‚Äôs back and still annoying. You ‚Äúwarn‚Äù us that once we delete it we can‚Äôt get it back- which would be great!- but it comes back anyway. Liars. All you have to do is refresh your profile page, and boom it‚Äôs back. I don‚Äôt use threads. I only got on once to see if it really was a crappy as twitter (which I also don‚Äôt use), and it is. But I can‚Äôt permanently delete my threads without deleting my IG profile. What a mess. And now this badge is false advertising. People will think I‚Äôm on threads only to find out I‚Äôm not. 

And my last review is still relevant‚Ä¶ spam bots out of control. Notes irrelevant. No one uses them and the avatar at the top is annoying. Searching for a better app. Spam bots/porn bots are out of control. I realize IG doesn‚Äôt want to do anything about them because they inflate their user numbers but c‚Äômon! The app is becoming unusable. And notes‚Ä¶ I had 3 friends use them. That‚Äôs it. I hid them because it‚Äôs annoying on top of my messages. No one else I know is bothering with notes. Really annoying seeing my avatar above my DMs. I‚Äôll never use it. Can you take away my notes and give it to the spam bots in these ratings complaining they never got it?
